casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Kenneth Kelly DUVALL 372P17-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 5, 2018 Mr. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina Mr. Kenneth Kelly Duvall, for Duvall, Kenneth Kelly Mr. David Learner, District Attorney, for State The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st of March 2018 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review: "Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of April 2018." Ervin, J. recused
